name: Juggler
description:
WELCOME TO THE WORLD'S MOST ACCURATE JUGGLING SIMULATOR

DO YOU THINK YOU'RE GOOD AT JUGGLING? WELL THINK AGAIN! IN ORDER TO BECOME A PRO LIKE ME, YOU MUST FIRST ENDURE THE JUGGLING SIMULATION. HERE ARE A FEW TIPS FOR THE NEWCOMERS:

  • YOU BETTER BE KEEPING WATCH ON YOUR BARRIER, BECAUSE WITH JUST ONE HIT, IT'LL BE GONE
  • EVERY 25 POINTS WILL BRING IN A NEW BALL, AND YOUR BARRIER WILL BE REPAIRED
  • BE READY TO BREAK YOUR FINGERS
